title: Theresa May – 2018 Speech on St. David’s Day
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, at Downing Street in London on 1 March 2018.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)
